alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, SCREVEN, EVANS, BULLOCH, JENKINS, CANDLER, EFFINGHAM, TATTNALL, HAMPTON, COLLETON AND ALLENDALE COUNTIES... At 642 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Seigling to near Oak Park, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Statesboro, Reidsville, Metter, Glennville, Allendale, Millen, Sylvania, and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper
